statements: DELETE FROM secure_communication WHERE client_name = 'ClientA' AND ip_address = '192.168.1.10';
DELETE FROM secure_communication WHERE client_name = 'John Doe' AND ssl_enabled = TRUE;
DELETE FROM logs WHERE log_message = 'Unauthorized access attempt';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE client_id = 101 AND amount > 100.00;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000.00 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM clients WHERE client_name = 'John Doe' AND client_email = 'john.doe@example.com';
